data.name: [14M+] Stepford County Railway
data.description:
Welcome to Stepford County Railway! A train network simulation game with driving, dispatching, guarding and signalling.

Note: We recently changed the way we store save data. If your points or any purchases were lost during transfer please let us know on Twitter or another platform.

Visit on a good PC or a smartphone with decent RAM for best experience.

Join the group and attend training sessions to get ranks and to unlock Dispatcher, Guard and Signaller roles in-game. You can try out these roles by joining a VIP server.

Group: https://www.roblox.com/groups/3620943
Twitter: @StepfordRail

A collaboration with BanTech Systems.
BanTech Systems: https://www.roblox.com/groups/3783896
BanTech Twitter: @BanTechRBLX

== Update Log ==
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/217981
